Uses of Class
Run4YourBits.Obstacle

    • Uses of Obstacle in Run4YourBits

      Subclasses of Obstacle in Run4YourBits 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Checkpoint
      This class defines the behavior of the checkpoint
      class  HighObstacle
      This type of obstacle hovers in midair, requiring you to duck in order to avoid crashing with them and lose a life by doing so
      class  LowObstacle
      Usually with around the same height as the character these obstacles must be avoided by jumping so you won't crash with them and lose a life by doing so.
      class  PowerUp
      Defines the behavior for the different Power-Ups
      Methods in Run4YourBits that return Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Obstacle[] Obstacle.getObstacleArray(int levelLength, int distanceBetween, int heightLowObs, int heightHighObs, int heightPowerUp, java.lang.String lowObstacleImage, java.lang.String highObstacleImage)
      Generates an array of Obstacles "randomizing" their position and type
